HKColocation.net launch our new dedicated servers with premium bandwidth connected with China Telecom and whole Asia.All of our servers hosted at Hong Kong Data Center

We are direct connected with China Telecom & China Unicom. Your server will have direct connection with major ISP in Asia Also in China.


*Mercury - Budget Server*

* Processor: Intel Dualcore 2.93G

* Memory: 4 GB DDR3 RAM

* IPv4 : 1 - 128 IP address

* IPv6 : /48 

* Storage: 500 GB SATA

* Bandwidth: 10TB Bandwidth Traffic / Unlimited inbound

* *100mbit Port offer

*$49/Month* No Setup Charge (PROMO CODE APPLY: LowEndTalk)
